tips.title: Step1:
tips.written: You can now get access to the live cheat app in Dude Theft Wars. To gain access tap on the mobile phone icon (on the left side). Now pick the “cheat.exe” app. You need to enter the cheat code (just tap on the app) and voila! Now you have access and can use a lot of cheat codes for free in the game.
